Text: Perhaps a bit more of a description would get you a few more downloads.  "Have fun!" doesn't really tell anyone anything.  The only thing I can find about a game called "The Last Alliance" is a project that went defunct before 2012 when it was officially announced that the project was discontinued indefinitely.  I have not been able to find any record of a 2013 RPG called The Last Alliance, so everyone, beware if you download this, as it is likely to be a jumbled up, bug ridden, unfinished game that you'll wish you hadn't wasted the time to download.
It might be made with one of those indie RPG engines, given the file names..some look pretty much stolen from some where else.
